text: Rh deficiency syndrome is a type of hemolytic anemia that involves erythrocytes whom membranes are deficient in Rh antigens. It is considered a rare condition. ==See also== * List of hematologic conditions * RHAG ==References== == External links == Category:Red blood cell disorders Category:Haemolytic anaemias Category:Rare syndromes Category:Syndromes affecting blood Category:Transfusion medicine
title: Rh deficiency syndrome
